author: Staff Reporter
text:
The body of a man aged around 40 years was found at Manakattur village near Natham on Wednesday.

Acting on information provided by a villager, the police found a sealed plastic container under a culvert on the Natham-Senthurai highway near Manakattur village. When they opened the container, they found a male body with head smashed beyond recognition and limbs chopped off.
title: Body found
